title: By the King, a proclamation for further proroguing the Parliament
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II)
publisher: Printed by the assigns of John Bill and Christopher Barker ...,
notes: "Given at our court at Whitehall, the two and twentieth day of September 1671. In the three and twentieth year of our reign."
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
